name: Sphysics
description:
Sphysics is a  physics based 2D platformer where you must rotate through different obstacles and levels in order to complete the game. 

Xbox controller is supported. 

Press "ESC" on keyboard or "Start" on controller for menu.

Made by 3 dudes in the Unity Engine during a 7 day game jam in Faxe, Denmark, 2018.
